<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Casgn Node Formatting

Represents a constant assignment (i.e. `A = 1`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
NAME = "toby"
```

After:

```ruby
NAME = "toby"
```

## Formats with operator assignment

Before:

```ruby
NAME += "toby"
```

After:

```ruby
NAME += "toby"
```

## Formats in a class definition

Before:

```ruby
class << self; NAME = "ftp"; end
```

After:

```ruby
class << self
  NAME = "ftp"
end
```
